0.content:
## ðŸ“‹ Claim registered
---
ðŸ’¼ Business KPI = Time taken to register claim.

1.content:
## ðŸ“± Document submission
---
ðŸ’¼ Business KPI = Success rate of document submission.

2.content:
## âœï¸ Internal review
---
ðŸ’¼ Business KPI = Percentage change in reviews done in the last 1 hour compared to yesterday.

3.content:
## ðŸ“¤ 3rd party review
---
ðŸ’¼ Business KPI = Time taken to initiate 3rd party review from internal.

4.content:
## âœ… Claim settled

ðŸ’¼ Business KPI = End-to-end claim settlement time.

14.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" 
| filter event.type == "customer.call" or event.type == "claim.registered"
| summarize {callTimestamp = takeMin(timestamp), claimTimestamp = takeMax(timestamp)}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(callTimestamp) or isNull(claimTimestamp)
| fieldsAdd duration = claimTimestamp - callTimestamp
| makeTimeseries {avg(duration)}, time:callTimestamp, bins:50

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" 
| filter event.type == "customer.call" or event.type == "claim.registered"
| summarize {callTimestamp = takeMin(timestamp), claimTimestamp = takeMax(timestamp)}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(callTimestamp) or isNull(claimTimestamp)
| fieldsAdd duration = claimTimestamp - callTimestamp
| makeTimeseries {avg(duration)}, time:callTimestamp, bins:50

15.content:
### Claims by type
---
How many claims are made under each available category.

16.content:
### Claim register time
---
Time taken to register the claim, Davis highlights where the value is higher or lower than expected.

17.content:
### Document submission success
---
Tracking over time whether documents are submitted successfully (ðŸŸ¢) or have issues (ðŸ”´).

22.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and startsWith(event.type, "documents.submitted")
| makeTimeseries `Count` = count(), by:{event.type}, bins:50

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
// Real example from the data, of the average time to start picking an order.
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" 
| filter event.type == "warehouse.received" or event.type == "item.picked"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd receiveTime = if(event.type == "warehouse.received", timestamp), pickTime = if(event.type == "item.picked", timestamp)
| summarize firstReceive = takeFirst(receiveTime), firstPick = takeFirst(pickTime), by:{order.id}
| filterOut isNull(firstReceive) or isNull(firstPick)
| fieldsAdd timeToPick = firstPick - firstReceive
| makeTimeseries ninetyTimeToPick = percentile(timeToPick, 90), time:firstPick, bins:50

23.content:
### Average submissions per city
---
Average number of documents submitted made by city.

26.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" 
| filter event.type == "customer.call" or event.type == "claim.registered"
| summarize callTimestamp = takeMin(timestamp), claimTimestamp = takeMax(timestamp), by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(callTimestamp) or isNull(claimTimestamp)
| fieldsAdd duration = claimTimestamp - callTimestamp
| summarize avgCallRegister = avg(duration)

28.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and startsWith(event.type, "documents.submitted")
| summarize success = countIf(event.type == "documents.submitted"), fail = countIf(event.type == "documents.submitted.assets.corrupt"), by:{claim.id}
| summarize successCount = sum(success), failCount = sum(fail)
| fieldsAdd successRate = (toDouble(successCount) / toDouble(successCount + failCount)) * 100

31.query:
fetch bizevents, from: -2h, to:-1h
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and event.type == "internal.review"
| summarize reviewsDoneNow = count(), by:{event.type}
| lookup [fetch bizevents, from: -25h, to:-24h | filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and event.type == "internal.review" | summarize reviewsDoneYesterday = count(), by:{event.type} ], sourceField:event.type, lookupField:event.type
| fieldsAdd percentageChange = ((toDouble(lookup.reviewsDoneYesterday) - toDouble(reviewsDoneNow)) / toDouble(reviewsDoneNow)) * 100

32.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "internal.review" or event.type == "third.party.review"
| summarize internalTime = takeMin(timestamp), thirdPartyTime = takeMax(timestamp), by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(internalTime) or isNull(thirdPartyTime)
| fieldsAdd duration = thirdPartyTime - internalTime
| summarize averageTime = avg(duration)

33.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and event.type == "internal.review"
| makeTimeseries `Count` = count(), interval:1h

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.AutoA.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance" and event.type == "order.packed"
| makeTimeseries ordersPacked = count(), interval:1h

34.content:
### Internal review volume
---
Number of internal reviews being completed, broken down hourly.

35.content:
### 3rd party review initiation
---
Time taken from finishing internal review to starting 3rd party review.

36.content:
### Additional evidence delays
---
Time taken to complete internal review with additional evidence (âšªï¸), and without (ðŸ”µ).

37.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "internal.review" or event.type == "third.party.review"
| summarize {internalTime = takeMin(timestamp), thirdPartyTime = takeMax(timestamp)}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut internalTime == thirdPartyTime
| fieldsAdd duration = thirdPartyTime - internalTime
| makeTimeseries averageTime = avg(duration), time:internalTime

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.Seaso.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "internal.review" or event.type == "third.party.review"
| summarize {internalTime = takeMin(timestamp), thirdPartyTime = takeMax(timestamp)}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(internalTime) or isNull(thirdPartyTime)
| fieldsAdd duration = thirdPartyTime - internalTime
| makeTimeseries averageTime = avg(duration), time:internalTime

39.content:
### Probable lost claims
---
Claims which went to internal review but have taken much longer than normal.

40.content:
### Total claim time
---
Time taken from registering a claim to having it settled.

41.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "claim.registered" or event.type == "claim.settled"
| summarize {registerTime = takeMin(timestamp), settleTime = takeMax(timestamp)}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut registerTime == settleTime
| fieldsAdd duration = settleTime - registerTime
| makeTimeseries averageTime = avg(duration), time:registerTime

42.content:
### End-to-end per claim type
---
Time from claim register to settlement, broken down by claim type.

45.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "claim.registered" or event.type == "claim.settled"
| summarize registerTime = takeMin(timestamp), settleTime = takeMax(timestamp), by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(registerTime) or isNull(settleTime)
| fieldsAdd duration = settleTime - registerTime
| summarize averageTime = avg(duration)

49.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "instaspect.submitted" or event.type == "internal.review"
| summarize internalCount = countIf(event.type == "internal.review"), thirdCount = countIf(event.type == "third.party.review"), firstReviewTime = takeFirst(timestamp), by:{claim.id}
| fieldsAdd timeSinceFirstReview = (now() - firstReviewTime)
| filter thirdCount == 0 and timeSinceFirstReview > toDuration(7200000000000)
| makeTimeseries `Probably lost claims` = count(), time:firstReviewTime, bins:50
| fieldsAdd totalLostClaims = arraySum(`Probably lost claims`)

78.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "claim.registered" or event.type == "claim.settled"
| summarize registerTime = takeMin(timestamp), settleTime = takeMax(timestamp), claimType = takeAny(claim.type), by:{claim.id}
| filterOut isNull(registerTime) or isNull(settleTime)
| fieldsAdd duration = settleTime - registerTime
| summarize averageTime = avg(duration), by:{claimType}

79.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "acme.insurance"
| filter event.type == "internal.review" or event.type == "third.party.review" or event.type == "further.evidence"
| summarize {internalTime = takeMin(timestamp), thirdPartyTime = takeMax(timestamp), furtherCount = countIf(event.type == "further.evidence")}, by:{claim.id}
| filterOut internalTime == thirdPartyTime
| fieldsAdd duration = thirdPartyTime - internalTime, thirdParty = if(furtherCount > 0, true, else:{false})
| makeTimeseries averageTime = avg(duration), time:internalTime, by:{thirdParty}, bins:50
